channel.title: Make a player wear an item do a command

item.title: Make a player wear an item do a command
item.dc:creator: @xsageofmali xsageofmali
item.description:
@xsageofmali wrote:

Okay, I’m trying to make a god command for normal players. I’m trying to make it where they have to wear the wings to do god mode. I’ve tried wearid or something but it doesn’t work. if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights == 0 && What goes here? == 6543) { startAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = 120; sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); sM("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sM("You need to bew wearing Wings to do god mode."); }

Read full topic
item.source: Make a player wear an item do a command
